comments.text:
Remember when BLR used to do music parodies? The last music video BLR did 
was 2.5 years ago. I know he got hit with some take down requests for some 
of his early videos (the Taylor Swift Rockin' All Nite Long one was my 
favorite of the ones he had to take down), so maybe the hassle of that 
turned him off from doing any more. That's a shame because as funny as the 
other ones are, the music videos are my favorites.﻿
